import React,{useState,useContext} from 'react' import {FirebaseContext} from '../Firebase/' const data = { pseudo:'', email:'', password:'', confirmPassword:'' } function Inscription() { const [loginData, setLoginData] = useState(data) const {pseudo, email, password, confirmPassword} = loginData const dataState = pseudo !=='' && email !=='' && password !=='' && password === confirmPassword ? () : () const firebase = useContext(FirebaseContext) // console.log(firebase) const submit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() firebase.signupUser(email,password) console.log(email,password) } const valueInput=(e)=>{ setLoginData({...loginData,[e.target.id]: e.target.value}) } return (

Inscription

{dataState}
) } export default Inscription
